---@class ProcessUtil
ProcessUtil = {}


function ProcessUtil:creatTree()

end
---@return ProcessTree
function ProcessUtil:creatMainBattleProcessTree(type)
    local tempTree = MainBattleProcessTree:new()
    tempTree:addNode(SetUpTeamNode:new(tempTree,1,type,1))
    tempTree:addNode(BattleMainNode:new(tempTree,2,type,1))
    return tempTree
end

return ProcessUtil
